Text: To my freinds and colleagues I have thoroughly appreciated my employment and the many friends I have made here at Enron These are tough times and my sympathy goes out to everyone Should things get tougher still for some of you I would like to extend my services as a real estate agent For some of you who dont know I have worked as a realtor in Houston for years If anyone needs help selling or buying a home I can be reached at Century ext Good Luck and God Bless each and everyone of us Thank you Joe Bucio
